required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Sevoflurane and Propofol on Optic Nerve Sheath Diameter During Laparoscopic Gynecologic Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized,Double-Blind Trial A Comparative Analysis of the Effects of Sevoflurane and Propofol on Optic Nerve Sheath Diameter During Steep Trendelenburg Position and Pneumoperitoneum for Laparoscopic Gynecologic Surgery

lead_sponsor.agency: Obstetrics & Gynecology Hospital of Fudan University

clinical_study.source: Obstetrics & Gynecology Hospital of Fudan University

brief_summary.textblock: Intracranial pressure（ICP) increases during laparoscopic gynecologic surgery increase (ICP) and may alter optic nerve sheath diameter(ONSD).This study measures ONSD in different team because sevoflurane and propofol have different effects on ICP.Half of participants will receive sevoflurane anesthesia,while the other half undergo propofol anesthesia.

detailed_description.textblock:
Due to the anatomical and physiological characteristics of optic nerve sheath ,ONSD increases when ICP rises.
Sevoflurane and propofol have different effects on ICP.When sevoflurane concentration >1.1 minimum alveolar concentration（MAC),ICP increases because of cerebral vasodilatation；on the other hand ,propofol constricts the blood vessels and ICP decreases.
ICP increases during laparoscopic gynecologic surgery because of steep Trendelenburg position and pneumoperitoneum .
Meanwhile,sevoflurane affects self regulation of cerebral blood flow on the way of dose dependent,but propofol has no effects on self regulation of cerebral blood flow.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of ultrasonographic optic nerve sheath diameter
primary_outcome.time_frame: from the time when patients enter into operation room to the time when the surgery ending
primary_outcome.description: different time including pre-anesthesia, after intubation,every 15 minutes in the first hour after beginning of surgery, every hour when one hour after surgery beginning,surgery ending.

secondary_outcome.measure: Analyzed whether mean arterial pressure influence the change of ONSD based on 110 patients in two groups.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the time when patients enter into operation room to the time when the surgery ending
secondary_outcome.description: Mean arterial pressure was collected when measures ONSD by ultrasound.

secondary_outcome.measure: Analyzed whether airway pressure influence the change of ONSD based on 110 patients in two groups.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the time when patients enter into operation room to the time when the surgery ending
secondary_outcome.description: airway pressure was collected when measures ONSD by ultrasound.

secondary_outcome.measure: Analyzed whether urine volume influence the change of ONSD based on 110 patients in two groups.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the time when patients enter into operation room to the time when the surgery ending
secondary_outcome.description: Recording urine volume when the surgery finished.

secondary_outcome.measure: Analyzed whether blood loss influence the change of ONSD based on 110 patients in two groups.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the time when patients enter into operation room to the time when the surgery ending
secondary_outcome.description: Recording blood loss when the surgery finished.

secondary_outcome.measure: Analyzed whether fluid volume influence the change of ONSD based on 110 patients in two groups.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the time when patients enter into operation room to the time when the surgery ending
secondary_outcome.description: Recording fluid volume when the surgery finished.

intervention.description: In Team Propofol ,anesthesia is maintained with propofol

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status diagnosed as I or II
Exclusion Criteria:
- neuromuscular diseases;laboratory abnormalities in electrolytes; liver and kidney dysfunction;allergy to general anesthetics;pregnancy;ocular lesions including ocular trauma, optic neuritis, optic nerve tumor.

facility.name: Obstetrics & Gynecology Hospital of Fudan University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Obstetrics & Gynecology Hospital of Fudan University
